gurmukhi: jYsy qau bsn AMg sMg imil huie mlIn sill swbun imil inrml hoq hY
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Basan Ang Sang Mili Hui Maleena , Salil Saaboun Mili Niramal Hot Hai ?
translation: Just as clothes become soiled by their touching the body but are washed clean with water and soap

gurmukhi: jYsy qau srovr isvwl kY ACwidE jlu Joil pIey inrml dyKIAY ACoq hY
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Sarovar Sivaal Kai Achhaadiao Jalu , Jholi Peeay Niramal Daykheeai Achhot Hai ?
translation: Just as the water in a pond is covered with thin film of algae and dropped leaves, but by brushing aside the film with hand, clean drinkable water appears.

gurmukhi: jYsy ins AMDkwr qwrkw cmqkwr hoq aujIAwro idnkr ky audoq hY
transliteration: Jaisay Nis Andhakaar Taarakaa Chamatakaara , Hot Ujeeaaro Dinakar Kay Udot Hai ?
translation: Just as the night is dark even with the twinkling of stars but with the rising Sun-light spreads all over.

gurmukhi: qYsy mwieAw moh BRm hoq hY mlIn miq siqgur igAwn iDAwn jgmg joiq hY ]312]
transliteration: Taisay Maaiaa Moh Bhram Hot Hai Maleen Mati , Satigur Giaan Dhiaan Jagamag Joti Hai ?312?
translation: So does the love of maya sully the mind. But by the teachings of True Guru and His contemplation, it becomes radiant. (312)
